OT_PD_SHOW_UPLOAD_CUSTOM_LABWARE_BUTTON.TODO: TODO: IL 2019-10-09 delete this, leaving as placeholder b/c no FFs remain
OT_PD_SHOW_UPLOAD_CUSTOM_LABWARE_BUTTON.title: Upload custom labware
OT_PD_SHOW_UPLOAD_CUSTOM_LABWARE_BUTTON.description: Show the "Upload Custom Labware" button to enable adding custom labware to protocol

OT_PD_ENABLE_GEN2_PIPETTES.title: Enable GEN2 pipettes
OT_PD_ENABLE_GEN2_PIPETTES.description: Enable the selection of Opentrons GEN2 pipettes when creating protocols

PRERELEASE_MODE.title: Use prerelease mode
PRERELEASE_MODE.description: Show in-progress features for testing & internal use

OT_PD_DISABLE_MODULE_RESTRICTIONS.title: Disable module restrictions
OT_PD_DISABLE_MODULE_RESTRICTIONS.description_1: Turn off all restrictions on module placement, labware placement on modules, and related pipette crash guidance.
OT_PD_DISABLE_MODULE_RESTRICTIONS.description_2: NOT recommended! Switching from default positions may cause crashes and the Protocol Designer cannot yet give guidance on what to expect. Use at your own discretion.
